Package controller

Class MainMenuController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.MainMenuController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class MainMenuController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    _____________________________________________________________________
    MAIN MENU CONTROLLER Class
    ---------------------------------------------------------------------
    This class is responsible for the follow:
    Launches the Add/Modify Part GUI
    Launches the Add/Modify Product GUI
    Deletes Pats/Products from inventory
    Closes the program

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MainMenuController()

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle rb)
      POPULATE PART/PRODUCT TABLES
      DEFAULT METHOD REQUIRED IN "Initializable"
      This method loads a unique partID for all new Parts
      void onActionDeletePart​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      DELETE PART FROM PART TABLE
      Prior to delete display confirmation dialog
      If user confirms delete perform delete action
      If no part is selected display error message
      void onActionDeleteProduct​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      DELETE PRODUCT FROM PRODUCT TABLE
      Prior to delete this method displays a confirmation dialog to the user
      If the user confirms the delete action is performed
      If no Product is selected an error message is displayed
      void onActionDisplayAddPartMenu​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      LAUNCH NEW PART MENU/CLASS
      void OnActionDisplayAddProductMenu​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      LAUNCH NEW PRODUCT MENU/CLASS
      void onActionDisplayModifyPartMenu​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      LAUNCH MODIFY PART MENU/CLASS
      If no part is selected to modify display error message
      Call sendPart method from ModifyPart controller to pass selected Part Object
      void onActionDisplayModifyProductMenu​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      LAUNCH MODIFY PRODUCT MENU/CLASS
      If no product is select an error message is displayed
      Call sendProduct method from ModifyProduct controller to pass selected Product Object to display data in appropriate fields
      void onActionExit​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      EXIT PROGRAM
      This method closes the program
      void onActionSearchParts​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      SEARCH AVAILABLE PART TABLE
      This method searches the available parts table which is populated with the Inventory allParts list to find objects matching the search terms either by partName or partID
      If no match is found an error message is displayed.
      void onActionSearchProduct​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      SEARCH PRODUCT TABLE
      This method searches the products table which is populated with the Inventory allProducts list to find objects matching the search terms either by productsName or productsID
      If no match is found an error message is displayed

    • Method Detail

      • onActionSearchParts

        public void onActionSearchParts​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        SEARCH AVAILABLE PART TABLE
        This method searches the available parts table which is populated with the Inventory allParts list to find objects matching the search terms either by partName or partID
        If no match is found an error message is displayed.
        Parameters:
        event - when the user presses enter in the search field the method executes a search

      • onActionDisplayAddPartMenu

        public void onActionDisplayAddPartMenu​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        LAUNCH NEW PART MENU/CLASS
        Parameters:
        event - on button click launch the NEW part GUI
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if GUI file is not found throw an exception

      • onActionDisplayModifyPartMenu

        public void onActionDisplayModifyPartMenu​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        LAUNCH MODIFY PART MENU/CLASS
        If no part is selected to modify display error message
        Call sendPart method from ModifyPart controller to pass selected Part Object
        Parameters:
        event - on button click launch the MODIFY part GUI
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if GUI file is not found throw an exception

      • onActionDeletePart

        public void onActionDeletePart​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        DELETE PART FROM PART TABLE
        Prior to delete display confirmation dialog
        If user confirms delete perform delete action
        If no part is selected display error message
        Parameters:
        event - on button click display confirmation dialog and if confirmed perform delete action

      • onActionSearchProduct

        public void onActionSearchProduct​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        SEARCH PRODUCT TABLE
        This method searches the products table which is populated with the Inventory allProducts list to find objects matching the search terms either by productsName or productsID
        If no match is found an error message is displayed
        Parameters:
        event - when the user presses enter in the search field the method executes a search
